description: As we move into meteorological spring, can we expect the weather to stay settled? Darren Bett has the long-range forecast.
title: Weather for the week ahead
title_page: Weather for the week ahead  - BBC Weather
maintext:
Published
26 February 2025
Updated 27 February 2025
As we move into meteorological spring, can we expect the weather to stay settled? Darren Bett has the long-range forecast.
